attributes.action: Bring Top Totty back to Strangers bar.
attributes.additional_details:
Top totty has been removed from the Strangers Bar due to a single complaint from a member of government.

This was due to the fact it apparently caused a member of parliament to feel disturbed.

If we are to improve the economy and generate revenue it surely does not make sense that a single complaint should be the cause of a beer or ale to be withdrawn from sale.

I would like to ask that the complaint be withdrawn and the beer re instated at The Strangers Bar.

I would also like a review into the law so that people and companies do not feel it necessary to either apologise or remove from sale or view items which cause concern or offence to a minority of people.
